title: BMW M3: All 4 Generations (E30, E36, E46, E92) at The Track!
description:
On this episode of Ignition, Carlos Lago is back and driving all four generations of his favorite German sports car, the BMW M3! Through 28 years of evolution, from E30 to E36 to E46 to E90, has the M3 lost its edge?

Ignition appears every Monday on the

asset.author: MotorTrend
asset.hookText:
On this episode of Ignition, Carlos Lago is back and driving all four generations of his favorite German sports car, the BMW M3! Through 28 years of evolution, from E30 to E36 to E46 to E90, has the M3 lost its edge?

Ignition appears every Monday on the Motor Trend youtube channel. http://www.youtube.com/motortrend
